sql.query: UPDATE review_forms SET assoc_type = 256
UPDATE review_form_elements SET included = 1
UPDATE notifications SET level = 2
DELETE FROM institutional_subscription_ip WHERE ip_start = 0 AND ip_end IS NULL
UPDATE notes SET assoc_type = 257
UPDATE articles a, journals j SET a.locale = j.primary_locale WHERE a.journal_id = j.journal_id
UPDATE articles SET locale = j.primary_locale FROM journals j WHERE articles.journal_id = j.journal_id
DELETE FROM journal_settings WHERE setting_name = 'supportedSubmissionLocales'

INSERT INTO journal_settings (journal_id, locale, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type) SELECT journal_id, locale, 'supportedSubmissionLocales', setting_value, setting_type FROM journal_settings WHERE setting_name = 'supportedFormLocales'
UPDATE groups SET publish_email = 1
UPDATE versions SET lazy_load = 0, sitewide = 1, product_class_name = '' WHERE product_type = 'core'
DELETE FROM versions WHERE product_type = 'plugins.generic' AND product IN ('jquery', 'shibboleth')
DELETE FROM plugin_settings WHERE plugin_name = 'JQueryPlugin'

DELETE FROM cv, cve, cves USING controlled_vocabs cv LEFT JOIN controlled_vocab_entries cve ON cv.controlled_vocab_id = cve.controlled_vocab_id LEFT JOIN controlled_vocab_entry_settings cves ON cve.controlled_vocab_entry_id = cves.controlled_vocab_entry_id WHERE cv.symbolic IN ('nlm30-publication-types', 'openurl10-journal-genres', 'openurl10-book-genres')

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t_cve_delete AS SELECT controlled_vocab_entry_id FROM controlled_vocabs cv INNER JOIN controlled_vocab_entries cve ON cv.controlled_vocab_id = cve.controlled_vocab_id WHERE cv.symbolic IN ('nlm30-publication-types', 'openurl10-journal-genres', 'openurl10-book-genres');
DELETE FROM controlled_vocab_entry_settings WHERE controlled_vocab_entry_id IN (SELECT * FROM t_cve_delete);
DELETE FROM controlled_vocab_entries WHERE controlled_vocab_entry_id IN (SELECT * FROM t_cve_delete);
DELETE FROM controlled_vocabs WHERE symbolic IN ('nlm30-publication-types', 'openurl10-journal-genres', 'openurl10-book-genres');
DROP TABLE t_cve_delete;
